description: Retrieves information about an MFA device for a specified user.

parameters.name: SerialNumber
parameters.description: Serial number that uniquely identifies the MFA device. For this API, we only accept FIDO security key ARNs.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The friendly name identifying the user.

nested_items.name: SerialNumber
nested_items.description: Serial number that uniquely identifies the MFA device. For this API, we only accept FIDO security key ARNs.

nested_items.name: EnableDate
nested_items.description: The date that a specified user's MFA device was first enabled.

nested_items.name: Certifications
nested_items.description: The certifications of a specified user's MFA device. We currently provide FIPS-140-2, FIPS-140-3, and FIDO certification levels obtained from FIDO Alliance Metadata Service (MDS).
